title: Action Music Bundle - Volume 4
description: Supercharge your action games and content with an explosive collection of heart-pounding soundtracks!
longDescription:
Unleash the Action with "Action Music Bundle: Volume 4"!


Supercharge your action games and content with an explosive collection of heart-pounding soundtracks!


"Action Music Bundle: Volume 4" brings together four diverse action-packed albums at a discounted price, saving you nearly $30 compared to buying them individually.


Fuel the Fury:


  • Cyborg Command (8 Looped Action Tracks): Electrifying synth leads and driving percussion create a futuristic soundscape perfect for fast-paced action and cybernetic showdowns.
  • Action RPG Combat (10 Dark Action Tracks): Gripping dark orchestral arrangements and intense percussion build the tension for epic battles and boss encounters in your action RPG.
  • Heraldry: Medieval Combat (8 Action Medieval Tracks): Energetic melodies and soaring choruses capture the spirit of classic medieval fantasy battles, ideal for high-stakes duels and heroic clashes.
  • Glitch Geist (8 Looped Action Tracks): Pulses quicken with glitchy electronic beats and distorted melodies, perfect for high-tech battles or encounters with digital entities.


Why Choose "Action Music Bundle: Volume 4"?


  • Diverse Action Styles: Each album caters to a distinct action theme, ensuring you have the perfect soundtrack to elevate every situation within your game or content.
  • High-Energy & Immersive: This expertly crafted music keeps players and viewers engaged, amplifying the excitement of the action.
  • Royalty-Free License: Use these tracks freely in your projects without additional fees.
  • Cost Savings: This bundle offers a significant discount compared to purchasing the albums individually (Save nearly $30!).


Perfect for:


  • Game Developers: Elevate your action game with heart-pounding soundtracks that fuel excitement and keep players on the edge of their seats.
  • Content Creators: Set the mood for your live streams and videos with dynamic, action-packed music, keeping viewers engaged and amplifying the intensity.


Don't miss out on this opportunity to ignite the action in your games and content! Get the "Action Music Bundle: Volume 4" for just $49.99 and start creating unforgettable moments today!

technicalDetails:
Sample rate / bit rate: (44,100 Hz)

Do Sound FX loop: (Yes - Glitch Geist & Cyborg Command)

Number of tracks: 34

Number of cues: 50

Minutes of audio provided: 90 minutes (1 Hour & 37 Minutes)

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: (Yes)
